, would you eat a cheese sandwich while everyone else gets to eat whatever they want??!?? All poverty students which is typically 70% of a school get TO EAT WHATEVER THEY WANT!!! I don't think any of you understand the lunch program. You feel sorry for the kid who had to eat a cheese sandwich (which the parent had to pay for it), but you've no idea what the underlying issue is. Why do poverty students get a free lunch while the rich students don't?!?? Everything else is paid for by the school district. And, I, mean everything else. Do you know why the federal government pays (with a contract) for free, reduced lunch, yet the rich students have to pay full price????? The rich students have to pay more to make up for the difference that the federal government doesn't pay for the poverty/reduced lunches!!!! This is what you should be outraged about, but no, you're little sheeple, who just follow along because the big, bad wolf is lurking in the woods and you're afraid of him. So, you pretend like you're all over the issue by getting mad at the parents who didn't pay up the bill. You should be mad at the federal government. I can't fight this issue, alone, people need to become aware of the real issue and start the movement with me. EVERY CHILD SHOULD RECEIVE A FREE LUNCH when they are a student at a federally funded school, regardless if the funds are federally released, released by grants, scholarships and/or other avenues of """"federal"""" funding which is the TAX PAYERS MONEY. Federal money is NOT what the government makes or earns...it is what YOU make and pay into!!! Please learn this.

That was years ago and nobody alive today owned a slave back then. The north and south fought over the government's actions. Both blacks and whites fought on both sides. Everyone had been doing fine until that moron shot those people in that church and posted a picture with the Rebel Flag. He was protesting his own lives struggles. He did wrong by shooting those people but he will get a slap on his little hands, if even that much, and be able to do it again. People are the problem, not this flag. The slaves from way back then are all passed. There are many blacks today who embrace this Rebel flag. Loni Aurora , are you saying they are racist? Because they stand with their white sisters and brothers holding this flag up proudly? If you do then YOU are part of this problem, not them or the flag.
